name: Puzzler World XL
synopsis: THE BEST-SELLING PUZZLER WORLD IS BACK! Boasting over 1,800 different puzzles, with favorites like Sudoku, crosswords and unique offerings like Link-A-Pix and Pieceword, puzzle fans are sure to find a wealth of fun in this unprecedented collection. Mind-boggling puzzles include: Crosswords, Wordsearch, Fitword, Pieceword, Backwords, Silhouette, Hide and Seek, Link-A-Pix, Sudoku, Hang-man, Add Up, Colour-In, Chain Letters, Picture Quiz, Jigsaw, Sum Up and Splitwords. Get your puzzle on!
